backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, access-controlled profile operations, and extensive resident-related types for physicians, medications, vitals, ADL records, and more.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and UI modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme tokens, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, authentication gating, and profile setup modal within the application shell.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays ADL records for a resident and allows adding new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for adding a new ADL record with fields for date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable screen showing an access-denied message with a button returning users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects name, user type, and optional related resident IDs, then saves the user profile via a mutation.
Layout component handling login/logout with Internet Identity and rendering app header, footer, and children.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records with medication lookup and provides a button to add new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal for creating a new MAR record by selecting an active medication and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medication sections with edit, discontinue, and reactivate actions when allowed.
Shows a list of medications for a resident with options to add, edit, or discontinue when write access is enabled.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal form for creating a new medication for a resident, managing input fields and submitting via useAddMedication.
Modal form for editing an existing resident medication, preloading values and submitting updates via useUpdateMedication.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Badge component that displays a resident’s code status as either DNR or Full Code with styled variants.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Large modal for entering all resident onboarding data including demographics, physicians, contacts, medications, insurance, and pharmacy info.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s information, including demographics, code status, physicians, and pharmacy data.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Print-only component generating a detailed resident profile report including personal info, physicians, medications, and pharmacy details.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of daily vitals for a resident and provides a modal to record new vitals if the user has write permission.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering a resident’s daily vitals and submitting them via useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, stats, and clinical data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode, and detailed print styles.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Authorization helper functions for checking staff/admin privileges and resident access rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, InternetIdentityProvider, QueryClientProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Resident dashboard that displays stats, searchable/sortable resident list, and modal for adding new residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Resident profile page that loads resident data, manages medication and record modals, handles reactivation/discontinuation actions, and supports printing with optional physician signature toggle.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, current features, new feature requests, and summary of medication reactivation and physician signature behavior.
